𓀗 𓀘 𓀙 𓀚 𓀛 𓀜 𓀝

Hiero = alt-heilig

Holy (hiero as in Hieroglyphs, hieros-gamos )
Old γέρων, gero, ἱερόν, yearo 𓇋𓄿𓅱𓏏𓀗, Hieros, Heros

Whatever 𒂠 G̃IR15, 𒆪 KU® (guerre) … might have meant originally,
𒅴𒂠 pheme.géro became to mean "old tongue".

ἱερός sacred, holy ἱερόν a temple ἱερωσύνης the priestly office γέρωντος an old man
𓋴𓍿𓎤𓎟 sacred oil
𓂦𓂋 Dsr ⋍ D-cr ⋍ Sacre

𒀊 Opa ≈ Hiero in 𒀍 𒀊·𒃲 AB·GAL irigal irrigated earth erşetu
